data.title: Queen Anne's County, MD - Official Website
data.meta_description: The Board of Elections works to conduct all elections (state, federal and special) in Queen Anne's County.
data.text:
Board Meetings

PUBLIC NOTICE: Queen Anne’s County Board of Elections, as prescribed by State Law, issues this public notice of the day, time and place of our regular monthly Board meetings. The meetings are usually held on the fourth Thursday of every month at 9 a.m unless otherwise noted. They are held in the Election Board located at 110 Vincit St., Suite 102, Centreville, MD. All meetings are subject to change.

The next meeting will be held on September 26th, 2024.

If anyone is interested in attending, please email Christine.Jones@maryland.gov

Members

Mary Walker, President

William Stoops, Vice President

Dorotheann Sadusky, Secretary

Mary Jane Sparks, Member

Katherine "Marion" Grier, Member

Purpose

To conduct all elections (state, federal and special) in Queen Anne’s County.
